title: Uncle Smiley goes up the river
creator_credit: Jim Burroughs, Joe Sutherin and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: Portrays Uncle Smiley and his group joining in an actual community-action program to clean up a river and its banks. Suitable for middle and upper primary level.
